page.title: 08Wetwang,Mobile shops
page.content:
Every day of the week mobile vans come to the village.Many of the old age pensioners depend on the vans for their shopping.The{milkman}comes every day during the morning.The{bread van, {Ray's Rambler,}goes round the village three times a week.The{fruit and {vegetable}van visits on a Saturday during the afternoon.The{butcher's van comes twice a week on a Thursday and Saturday.{Woodheads,who sell a bit of {everything,}come twice a week,Tuesday and Thursday.
I only buy sweets occasionally from the Rambler van.But people who do not have a car have to buy most of their food regularly from the mobile vans.
